title: Thank the lord baby jesus...
body:
Amumu is finally viable again.  My favorite champion, hands down.  Been playing him since season 1 - 2.

Fell off pretty bad when they changed his passive and nerfed his W, but he's back baby!

The new Guise/Liandry's is SOOOOOOOOOOO good for him.  Boneplate is super good on him too with conditioning.

If I get way ahead, I just rush rylai's and liandry's.

If I'm needing to tank vs AD, I build frozen heart and liandry's.

If I'm needing to tank vs AP, I build abyssal and liandry's.

I have options!  I can play my favorite champ again!  WOOOHOOOO

replies.body:
Was Amumu not viable all those times i was playing him as an AP carry support? Shit..

Explains a lot.
